casebody.data:
Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Gwyn.

[Cite as Disciplinary Counsel v. Gwyn (1994), 71 Ohio St.3d 8.]

(No. 94-1371 Submitted August 17, 1994 Decided November 16, 1994.) *10Geoffrey Stem, Disciplinary Counsel, and Alvin E. Mathews, Jr., Assistant Disciplinary Counsel, for relator. Mark H. Aultman, for respondent. Per Curiam.

After careful review of the record, we adopt the board’s findings of misconduct and its recommendation. Accordingly, Peter D. Gwyn is hereby publicly reprimanded for having violated DR 1-102(A)(4) and 6-101(A)(3). Costs taxed to respondent.

Judgment accordingly.

A.W. Sweeney, Douglas, Wright, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., concur. Moyer, C.J., dissents and would suspend respondent for one year, stayed on the condition of no further misconduct.
